mapper.sql: ID, TYPE, NAME, DISPLAY_NAME, `INDEX`, ISNEW, START_POINTS, BLAST_POINTS, FLAG_POINTS, WEAPON_POINTS, BOSS_ITEMS, IS_SELF, DESCRIPTION, ZOMBIE_INFO, LEVEL_HORIZON, VEHICLE_LINE_INFO, VEHICLE_ADD_NUM, VEHICLE_INFO, TARGET_SPEED, BLOOD_OFFSET, IS_RUSH_GOLD, IS_MONEY_REWARD, RUSH_GOLD_POINT, IS_VIP, EXP_ADD, GP_ADD, ACTIVITY_START, ACTIVITY_END, NUM_FOR_TEAM, IS_GM
mapper.select:
select count(*) from SYS_LEVEL where 1=1
and ( ID like '${searchValue}%' or DISPLAY_NAME like '${searchValue}%' or `NAME` like '${searchValue}%' )
mapper.insert: insert into SYS_LEVEL (ID, TYPE, NAME, DISPLAY_NAME, `INDEX`, ISNEW, START_POINTS, BLAST_POINTS, FLAG_POINTS, WEAPON_POINTS, BOSS_ITEMS, IS_SELF, DESCRIPTION, ZOMBIE_INFO, LEVEL_HORIZON, VEHICLE_LINE_INFO, VEHICLE_ADD_NUM, VEHICLE_INFO, TARGET_SPEED, BLOOD_OFFSET, IS_RUSH_GOLD, IS_MONEY_REWARD, RUSH_GOLD_POINT, IS_VIP, EXP_ADD, GP_ADD, ACTIVITY_START, ACTIVITY_END, NUM_FOR_TEAM, IS_GM, SUPPLIES) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{index,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isnew,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{startPoints,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{blastPoints,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flagPoints,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weaponPoints,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bossItems,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isSelf,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zombieInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{levelHorizon,jdbcType=REAL}, #{vehicleLineInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehicleAddNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vehicleInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{targetSpeed,jdbcType=REAL}, #{bloodOffset,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isRushGold,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isMoneyReward,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rushGoldPoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isVip,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{expAdd,jdbcType=REAL}, #{gpAdd,jdbcType=REAL}, #{activityStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{activityEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{numForTeam,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isGm,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{supplies,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

update SYS_LEVEL
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISPLAY_NAME = #{displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`INDEX` = #{index,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
